Nastia Tulayeva is a designer and illustrator.

I like making things, observing things, and writing what I see and think. Raised in Belarus, based in Belgrade, Serbia.

I know:

UX/UI and product design Branding and logos B2B SaaS and B2C HTML and CSS AI-first Accessibility Digital illustration User and market research UX copy Product management Data visualisation Dashboard design

I design with Figma, and am currently learning to do it with code. Illustrations are drawn by hand, in ProCreate, or Adobe Illustrator. I'm familiar with Jira, Confluence, and Microsoft Azure. I worked mostly in cross-functional teams, as well as a part of design teams of 10+ people. I have experience of being an architect, urbanist, event manager, editor and Tableau engineer.
